--- title: pandas_show.core keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Display a long Pandas DataFrame or Series in a wide format" description: "Display a long Pandas DataFrame or Series in a wide format" nb_path: "00_core.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

display_frames[source]

display_frames(*dataframes)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df1 = pd.DataFrame(dict(code=[1,2,3], name=["a", "b", "c"]))
df1
code name
0 1 a
1 2 b
2 3 c
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df2 = pd.DataFrame(dict(Code=[10,20,30, 40], Name=["A", "B", "C", "D"]))
df2
Code Name
0 10 A
1 20 B
2 30 C
3 40 D
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
s1 = pd.Series(["x", "y"], name="Var")
s1

0    x
1    y
Name: Var, dtype: object
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
display_frames(df1, df2, s1)
code name
0 1 a
1 2 b
2 3 c
Code Name
0 10 A
1 20 B
2 30 C
3 40 D
Var
0 x
1 y
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

display_in_cols[source]

display_in_cols(df:Union[DataFrame, Series], n_disp_cols:int=1)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
display_in_cols(df2, 2)
Code Name
0 10 A
1 20 B
Code Name
2 30 C
3 40 D
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
